greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number triangle T(n,k) = binomial(k-n, n-k)*(-1)^(n-k) = (0^(n-k) + binomial(2*(n-k), n-k))/2 if k <= n, 0 otherwise; Riordan array (1/(2-C(x)), x) where C(x) is g.f. for Catalan numbers A000108.
comment: Rows sums are A024718. Diagonal sums are A106269. Inverse is A106270.
formula: Bivariate g.f.: Sum_{n, k >= 0} T(n,k)*x^n*y^k = (1/2) * (1/(1 - x*y)) * (1 + 1/sqrt(1 - 4*x)). - _Petros Hadjicostas_, Jul 15 2019
example: Triangle (with rows n >= 0 and columns k >= 0) begins as follows:
program: (PARI) trg(nn) = {for (n=1, nn, for (k=1, n, print1(binomial(k-n,n-k)*(-1)^(n-k), ", ");); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 03 2014
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Apr 28 2005
